member.name: COLORTYPE
member.summary: The values of the COLORTYPE enumeration are used by several WCS functions. Variables of type COLOR are defined in the color spaces enumerated by the COLORTYPE enumeration.

member.name: COLORTYPE.COLOR_GRAY
member.summary: The COLOR is in the GRAYCOLOR color space.

member.name: COLORTYPE.COLOR_RGB
member.summary: The COLOR is in the RGBCOLOR color space.

member.name: COLORTYPE.COLOR_XYZ
member.summary: The COLOR is in the XYZCOLOR color space.

member.name: COLORTYPE.COLOR_Yxy
member.summary: The COLOR is in the YxyCOLOR color space.

member.name: COLORTYPE.COLOR_Lab
member.summary: The COLOR is in the LabCOLOR color space.

member.name: COLORTYPE.COLOR_3_CHANNEL
member.summary: The COLOR is in the GENERIC3CHANNEL color space.

member.name: COLORTYPE.COLOR_CMYK
member.summary: The COLOR is in the CMYKCOLOR color space.

member.name: COLORTYPE.COLOR_5_CHANNEL
member.summary: The COLOR is in a five channel color space.

member.name: COLORTYPE.COLOR_6_CHANNEL
member.summary: The COLOR is in a six channel color space.

member.name: COLORTYPE.COLOR_7_CHANNEL
member.summary: The COLOR is in a seven channel color space.

member.name: COLORTYPE.COLOR_8_CHANNEL
member.summary: The COLOR is in an eight channel color space.

member.name: COLORTYPE.COLOR_NAMED
member.summary: The COLOR is in a named color space.
